The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 05 August is 58,441 (6,735.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 31 July, there were 2,202 new confirmed cases (253.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 July, there were 2,855 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 23% (653 fewer cases).
